meanings.sent1: You can go outside, nisi it's raining.
meanings.sent2: I will attend the party, nisi I have other plans.
meanings.sent3: She wanted to bake cookies, nisi the oven broke.
meanings.sent4: His team will win the game, nisi they make too many mistakes.
meanings.sent5: Nisi you study hard, you won't pass the test.

meanings.sent1: Everyone is coming to the meeting, nisi John.
meanings.sent2: I like all fruits, nisi bananas.
meanings.sent3: The store had all items, nisi the one I needed.
meanings.sent4: The park is open to all, nisi on Mondays.
meanings.sent5: Nisi for the noise, the room was silent.

meanings.sent1: She walked out nisi saying a word.
meanings.sent2: He managed to finish the race nisi stopping.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear nisi a trace.
meanings.sent4: The cat sneaked into the room nisi being noticed.
meanings.sent5: The flower bloomed beautifully nisi any sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Please call me, nisi I'll be worried.
meanings.sent2: I need to leave now, nisi I'll miss the bus.
meanings.sent3: He must finish the project today, nisi he'll be late.
meanings.sent4: She should eat something, nisi she'll feel weak.
meanings.sent5: Nisi you hurry, we'll be late for the movie.
